|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :Internal unused SATA port. {{see also|List of Cloud Engines Devices}} ====Requirements==== *'''Pogoplug V3''' - Dual @700MHz ARM CPU, 128MB RAM, SATA (internal), :Gigabit Ethernet, 4x USB 2.0 Ports, Wireless: only '''Pogoplug Pro''' :comes with built in Wi-Fi ([[AzureWave AW-NE762H]] PCIe RT3090) *[[Cloud Engines Pogoplug B01|POGO-B01]], POGO-B02, POGO-B03, POGO-B04 (''PLX'') - '''Pogoplug Classic''' *[[Pogoplug Pro|POGO-P01]], POGO-P02 (Wi-Fi [http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-E8rjRtXnY1c/VSTIvMoExYI/AAAAAAAAAgU/8W6IZpLqRPw/s1600/Pogoplug%2B%2BPro%2BPCIE%2BWireless%2BCard.JPG AzureWave AW-NE762H]) - '''Pogoplug Pro''' *[[Cloud Engines Pogoplug V3 (POGO-P21)|POGO-P21]], POGO-P22, POGO-P24, POGO-P25 (''OxNAS'') - '''Pogoplug V3''' *[[Cloud Engines Pogoplug E02|POGO-E02]] (CPU: Marvell 88F6281 @1.2GHz ''Kirkwood'') - '''Pogoplug V2''' '''Note:''' Model numbers located on bottom of foot. Please ignore the label on the box. :You can potential receive a Pogoplug V2 when buying a P21/P22. :Check the bottom of the Pogoplug's foot for correct model ! ==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/cloudengines/pogoplugpro ''Pogoplug Pro'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ===Alternate OS support=== *[http://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv6/pogoplug-provideov3 ''Arch Linux'' (Arm)] *[http://forum.doozan.com/read.php?2,16044 ''Debian Jessie'' w/ 4.4.54 Kernel] *[http://blog.qnology.com/2015/04/hacking-pogoplug-v3oxnas-proclassic.html ''Hacking the Pogoplug v3/Oxnas (Pro/Classic) with Debian''
on '''techNOLOGY''' blog] ([http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_89K8LAAGLA/VSTIw24EoBI/AAAAAAAAAgc/gZkddbRr_4o/s1600/Pogoplug%2BV3.JPG PCB images]) ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/cloud_engines/pogoplug_pogoplug_v3_pro |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/cloud_engines/pogoplugpro |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = oxnas |subtarget = ox820 |arch = arm_mpcore |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here [[Category:English Documentation]]
